name: Yonin no Nibiiro
nutshell: As he walks down the street, Yu spots a naked figure in a fur coat. Bound to be arrested by the police, Yu grabs the strange naked man and starts running. Little does he know he just laid his hands on the yakuza's belonging. That reality quickly catches up to him literally, and before he knows it, Yu is in the middle of yakuza territory. Hot-headed Makoto flaunts his power as usual while calm and collected Ai, his half-brother and first-man, takes care of the aftermath. Gradually, the complications and relations between the yakuza come to light... Yu stepped on a landmine, but how far will the blast reach?

name: Emma and the Earl
nutshell: The penniless Miss Emma Lawrence has no choice about accepting the post of governess to the young daughter of Dominic Hastings, the Earl of Chard. But what unkind twist of fate has her working for the man she might have married when she was the rich Miss Emilia Lincoln? And – more disconcerting – will he recognise her? In ten years they have both changed so much – except for Emma's abiding love for Dominic . . . .

name: Goshimei Arigatou Gozaimasu!
nutshell: Mizuki Hina is a girl who never liked learning, and her test scores are naturally at the bottom of the class. Even most of the tutors don’t really know what to do with her. One day a young handsome tutor named Sakuya Ichijo came. His ways of teaching are different; When Hina is learning from him, learning felt just like talking to a friend. Hina also had developed a secret love for Ichijo that she is trying her best to hide. Could Ichijo possibly have the power to change her test scores?

name: A Thousand Years Ninetails
nutshell:
In a city that is neither small nor big, there's a mountain that people avoid. The undeveloped mountain isn't protected with a green belt nor is it a site of environmental conservation. The avoided, prohibited forest… With the dismal atmosphere and the rumors that whisper about the spirits, let it to be called Spirit Mountain.
On the mountain there's a house, a famed house of mediums that shows off their long glorious history of their heritage. Hence, it was once called Medium Mountain.
But once, a long time ago, they said a Ninetails lived there… And was known as the Fox Mountain.
But now, 20 years later, a dark aura covered this isolated place…
Official Traditional Chinese

name: Yasuko and Kenji
nutshell:
Since the death of her parents, Oki Yasuko, a second-year high school student, has been living with her mangaka big brother Kenji, who used to be the boss of a biker gang. Bickering nonstop, their relationship is hardly harmonious.
One day in the cram school Kenji forces her to attend, Yasuko falls in love with Tsubaki Jun. But chaos ensues because of the history that Kenji and Jun’s sister Erica share! (From: Ivyscan)

name: Kibishii no de Aru
nutshell: Chikara and Kijima have been sharing a 10 year friendship. But Chikara's feelings have changed… will Kijima come to share the same feelings?

name: Stage Of The Dark Souls
nutshell:
There’s an old rumor about the Schravant’s mansion. That a dark devil will, one day, come to take away the beautiful master of the house. It seems to be nothing more than fanciful thinking, but how does that explain the change that Mihael brings when he barges into the Schravant brother’s lives? The devil will find what Evan and Victor Schravant desire, even if they desperately try to suppress those urges.
They say the world’s a stage—what play will these dark souls enact?

name: Fullmetal Alchemist - A Father's Feeling (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: MiXiM 11
nutshell: Matsuri Ichimatsu, Haruno Koume, and Sanguubashi Takezou are old friends with one thing in common: despite their good looks, they're incredibly unpopular with the ladies. But what does Polaris have to do with their fate? And will they ever get that harem they've always wanted?

name: Memoir of a Dancer
nutshell: A man is on a research expedition in an underwater city, when he suddenly discovers a holographic recording of a ballerina.

name: Entre tus labios y dientes
nutshell: The steady talk-show host Yan Chao and the flashy fast-talking actor Zhou Chenyu were put together in a reality (i.e. matchmaking) show. What kind of sparks will fly when they put their speaking skills to the test against each other?

name: [GwangGong Industrial Complex] Hellen
nutshell: Philip comes up with a lot of interest in the midst of ridiculing Hae-in, calling him "Hellen" to the white hair, red eyes, and year with the name of the Asian. Philip, who has a fanatical dome tendency, imposes a semi-forced DS relationship, imagining the excitement of controlling the pathological trauma and drug addiction of the year. However, gradually after entering Korea, when the year is out of his control, Philip's dangerous control to domesticate him again begins.

name: Sayonara Shitsuren Banchou
nutshell: Shibuya Hiromi's mother eloped with Ootsuka Junko's father, who lived in the same apartment building!? The two were initially at each other's throats, however, realizing their circumstances, both decide instead to take the motto, "Become more happy than those two that left!!" and tackle their love lives aggressively. Both continue on their record of heartbreaks, until Ootsuka finally gets a boyfriend!?

name: My Little Fox Star
nutshell:
Wishing fox star
"There is something invisible to others but visible to me. A curse and a journey. To meet the fox star that will grant my wish. My wish for complete silence."

name: My Way Of Killing Gods In Another World
tags: Action,Long Strip,Martial Arts,Adventure,Virtual Reality,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell:
The genius top student played games in an attempt to flirt with girls, but was struck by lightning on a rainy day and transported into the world of the game?! To survive here, he could only rely on himself. Surrounded by monsters and gods, full of dangers, can he still return to his own world and continue chasing girls?!


Original Manhua <Tencent Comics>
Original Manhua <Bilibili Comics>
Original Manhua <Kuaikan Manhuas>

name: Zettai Kakusei Tenshi Mistress☆Fortune
nutshell: Tachikawa Kisaki is a 14-year-old girl who's a drop-out ESPer. Her object of adoration is Hashiba Giniro, a superb ESPer who could use ESP at the age of five. Watch them as they become the team of "Fortune Tiara" and "Fortune Quartz", while carry out their duties as a combination!

name: Fate/hollow ataraxia - Hometown (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Background noise characters trying to figure out Archer's identity, because they think he reminds them of someone.

name: Banana no Nana
nutshell: On the world that consists of a single giant continent called Dokkanon, most people have some kind of special ability. Those who have a high-ranking ability, such as the ability to control water, are respected and granted much power. Those with low-ranking abilities, such as Nana, who controls bananas, and her best friend Ringo, who has super-powerful legs, have very little power in society. When Nana and Ringo were kids, they were awed by stories from Ringo's adventurer father about a land called Oz, where a god lived who could make any wish come true. Nana and Ringo swore that they would go adventuring together when they were adults. But as time went by, Ringo's father vanished while adventuring, and Ringo became much more aware of the social stigma associated with adventurers. Will the two of them find the strength and courage to follow through with their promise?

name: 2011 Mystery Short Webtoons
nutshell:
A collection of ghost stories all meant to send a chill down your spine.

Research (HWANG Joon-Ho/YEON Je-Won)


Lovers (HWANG Joon-Ho)
The Profile (Lee Seung Chan)
The Maze (TGM/Linda (린다))

A Bathroom Tale (Hwang Youngchan)
The Moon Below, Part 1 (Yuria)
The Moon Below, Part 2 (Yuria)
First Acquaintances (Lee Seung Chan)
The Visitor (Mirchi)

04 : 44 (CHOI Yoon-Jin)

name: Mermaid Syndrome
nutshell: A mermaid and the illness called “love,” an easy-going young company owner and the “forest spirit” he encounters, and more – four entwining fantasy stories in Kamata Kimiko’s magnificent and yet delicate style.

name: Tameiki no Ondo
nutshell:
Collection of short stories:


Tameiki no Ondo
Jun is always being compared to his older brother Ryou, and falling short. But when his brother's friend Yuuya starts to tutor him, his patient nature begins to get through to Jun. When Jun realizes Yuuya's feelings for Ryou, he must confront his own feelings for Yuuya.


Blind


Distance


Border


Bokutachi no Sotsugyou (Our Graduation)
Umebayashi has been in love with Matsubara from the day they first met, but cramped by his rival, Takeshiba, he never got around to express his feelings. Now that graduation is nearing, the boys feel the need to confess to the ones they like.

name: Siren's Lament
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Adventure,Magic,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Mystery,Music,Full Color
nutshell: Content with her ordinary life, Lyra is somewhat of a wallflower. However, her comfortable lifestyle suddenly goes astray when she accidentally plunges into the world of sirens. Entangled in a curse, Lyra will learn that her world may be a lot bigger than she had ever imagined.

name: Bleach - Under the Rose (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Hichigo x Ichigo

name: Shin Jigoku Shoujo
nutshell: The sequel to the Jigoku Shoujo manga.

name: Begone, Ultramarine - Fragile Light of Pistol Star -
nutshell:
16-year-old Nanakusa is spending his mundane life on "Stairway Island" where he found himself "discarded" along with 2000 other people, all missing the memories of the time just before they arrived there. The name of the island originates from the long stairway running through the island and extending up to the summit of the mountain where the witch who rules the island is said to live. The only way to leave the island is by finding what was lost. Yet Nanakusa doesn't wish to leave this stagnant island. He enjoys his life there.
That is until Manabe Yuu, his childhood friend appears in front of him, and turns his new life upside-down. Why did Manabe Yuu, the world's most optimistic person, get discarded, and who is the witch behind all these mysterious occurrences? Follow Nanakusa and Manabe as they uncover the true nature of Stairway Island.
Based on the bestselling youth mystery novel by Yutaka Kono and illustrated by Ai Uzuki.

Aoki Kaoru is a 26-year-old woman who has never had a boyfriend. Normally unattached and unmotivated in her own life, Kaoru decides to start up a nail salon as a side business in addition to her regular job as a medical clerk. Although having a severe adversity to physical touch, she is forced to confront that fear when she meets a man who can’t help but touch others.

name: S+ Rush!!
nutshell: After Ryou uses details of Ogura's past to blackmail him into leaving Yuu and Hinata alone, the two somehow keep running into each other. Slowly, Ryou's malicious glee and Ogura's feelings of shame and unease begin to transform into something else….

name: Senpai
nutshell: Fujinami Kou is a high school second year who has lost his boyfriend, an upperclassman schoolmate, to a car accident in the previous year. On the anniversary of Misumi-senpai's death, Kou is dispirited and contemplating skipping school. Kakitsubata Saki, a first year student, sees him and offers help, assuming that he's ill. As Kou startles at the sight of Saki's face and mentions that he resembles "the person I used to go out with", the younger boy is instantly intrigued and resolves to discover his sorrowful, introverted upperclassman's secret.

name: Lost Mouse Girl
nutshell: Of all the days in the year, Yumeko has one day she hates the most. Can an unexpected trip to another world change that?
